comments:
Several problems can be seen when using the UI to work with VDisks on IBM SVC :
ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception occures when showing the VDisks on a MDisk group
and then trying to show the VDisks on another MDisk group.
This will fail with an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException and requires UI to be shutdown and restarted since the UI is in an unusable state.

Pretty messy bunch of stacks, but it looks like Megatable is the main problem.
Let me know if you need help getting an SVC to test with.

This bug is due to the table's view to model mapping was not cleaned up while the table data had been updated when user selected a different managed disk group.  Since old mappings were being used to extract a row's data and to calculate its column sizes, exceptions might be thrown due to incorrect mappings. The table model must also be set before setting the table cell renderer to avoid ClassCastException occurred when renderer was applied to an old model.
